description:
Tom Crowther KC was asked by the Government to help establish local rape gang inquiries. Why, after three months, has he heard nothing about their progress? Katie Lam put the question to Jess Phillips in the Commons today.

The post What’s Happened to the Rape Gang Inquiries? appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: What’s Happened to the Rape Gang Inquiries?

description:
Why are anti-woke Rangers fans given lifetime stadium bans but pro-Hamas Celtic fans get off much more lightly? It's because supporting Palestine is part of our elites' luxury beliefs, says Dr David McGrogan.

The post Why Are Anti-Woke Rangers Fans Given Lifetime Bans But Not Pro-Hamas Celtic Fans? appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Why Are Anti-Woke Rangers Fans Given Lifetime Bans But Not Pro-Hamas Celtic Fans?

description:
A Colombian migrant who committed 27 offences to fund his drug and drink habit and who violated a restraining order against his former partner has avoided deportation under ECHR human rights rules for "family life".

The post Migrant Who Offended 27 Times to Fund Drink and Drugs Can Stay in UK Under ECHR appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Migrant Who Offended 27 Times to Fund Drink and Drugs Can Stay in UK Under ECHR

description:
Keir Starmer's cynical class war on private schools and hereditary peers to appease the hard Labour Left harms us all, says Dominic Lawson, not least as 25% of private school households earn below average income.

The post Starmer’s Cynical Class War on Private Schools and Hereditary Peers Only Does us Harm appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Starmer’s Cynical Class War on Private Schools and Hereditary Peers Only Does us Harm

description:
A top state school has published its Relationships and Sex Education materials online and the content is damning, says Caroline Ffiske. Stuffed with gender ideology pseudoscience, no wonder teenagers are confused.

The post The Gender Ideology Pseudoscience Being Pushed on Teenagers by Britain’s Top Schools appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: The Gender Ideology Pseudoscience Being Pushed on Teenagers by Britain’s Top Schools

description:
Ed Miliband has promised to save Britain's economy from Trump's tariffs. But it wasn't Trump who closed Britain's coal-fired power stations, nor ended oil and gas exploration, nor banned fracking, says Ben Pile.

The post The Government’s Dangerously Empty Response to Trump appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: The Government’s Dangerously Empty Response to Trump

description:
The ban on Lucy Connolly being permitted temporary release from jail to see her young daughter and sick husband is unprecedented, says David Shipley. Even murderers get that. The instruction must have come from higher up.

The post The Ban on Lucy Connolly Seeing Her Family Must Have Come From Higher Up appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: The Ban on Lucy Connolly Seeing Her Family Must Have Come From Higher Up
